author: Dan Cancian
title: Indianapolis Colts Owner Donates 10,000 N95 Masks to Healthcare Workers
description: Jim Irsay had previously donated $1 million to a food bank in Indianapolis and challenged Colts fans to raise $200,000 for children whose parents have been affected by the job losses due to the virus.
content:
Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay is the latest NFL owner to donate protective equipment to healthcare workers working on the frontline against the coronavirus pandemic.
On Sunday, the 60-year-old took to Twitter to confirm he had "procured" at least 10,000… [+4314 chars]
